name: volunteer-connect
description: This project involves the development of a responsive and interactive website named Volunteer Connect. The website fulfills all requirements specified in the assignment, such as dynamic content generation, interactive features, and responsive design. The group (Group 5) includes me Mohammed Aasim and Ashar Asad, we collaborated to achieve the desired functionality and design while adhering to best practices in web development.
author: Mohammed Aasim, Ashar Asad
